email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the OCEAN MASTER (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 300m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. Cargo size is 120,000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 Nov. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the quote. USD 18.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 27 Nov - 2 Dec?

Cheers,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 27 Nov - 2 Dec. Please confirm.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - OCEAN MASTER
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: OCEAN MASTER
- Cargo: 120,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 27 Nov - 2 Dec
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Alex
